Articles.Content:
I've been experiencing a bug ever since the latest update involving wheels.

When I build a rover, the wheels appear to accelerate the vehicle rapidly whenever I am both turning and accelerating (pressing both the turn and forward keys at once).  The only limit I have found to this is the amount of stresses the wheels can take.

Yesterday I build this rover base.  By continuously holding turn and accelerate, driving in a large circle, it continued to gain speed up into the 60 m/s range, despite the wheels having a top speed of 15 m/s.

 

If I alternate tapping left and right, heading generally straight, I reach speeds in excess of 100 m/s!

 

Now, admittedly, this has been pretty funny to play with, but it is making steering difficult without losing control or popping tires.

Anyone else getting this one?  I've tried a re-install, but no change.
